long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatScribe - WhatsApp Web Voice Message Transcriber & Translator

Transform how you handle voice messages on WhatsApp Web with our powerful Chrome extension! Whether you're in a busy environment or simply prefer reading over listening, this tool has got you covered. It not only transcribes voice messages but also provides concise summaries and translations into your preferred languageâ€”all at no cost!

Key Features:

Accurate Transcription: Convert WhatsApp Web audio messages into text with ease.
Summarization: Get the essence of long audio messages quickly with auto-generated summaries.
Instant Translation: Translate transcribed messages into multiple languages for better understanding.
User-friendly: Seamlessly integrates into WhatsApp Web, providing a smooth and hassle-free experience.
Perfect for professionals, multilingual users, or anyone who wants to manage audio messages more efficiently!
